relation: Share any unusual traditions or locations on campus
I've heard a lot of stories but if you're with someone you should be fine. Nothing has happened to me so far and I hope never. Just keep a pepper spray with you always!
The cool thing about St. Cloud State University is that if you ride the city bus here, its free. You can go to the mall, downtown, etc. Many places and they are out late.
The gym is always open, free rock climbing, clubs & organization, and hanging out in your dorm.
Not always the best but many different varieties to choose from.
They have really strict rules. You always have to have you student ID with you after 7:00PM
Its not too difficult nor too easy. Usually depending on the classes you choose.
They provided me with a good financial aid packet. What I really like about it is that you can take food from the cafeteria to your dorm. Its a median size University.
pageTitle: St. Cloud State University Reviews: Student Reviews and Ratings | Cappex

There is a few different options but when I attended school there 2007-2009 I wasn't impressed with the options. There is also a Subway and Dominos but I personally don't like either. The Dining Hall had a few different options like a salad bar and a sandwich station but nothing is great., 186873=Sober living...AA meetings. Great idea just not a big turn out back in 2004-2005.}

textAfterTable: Tips for prospective students SCSU is known for it's partying, and there is a lot of that going on at campus but stay focused and remember that you are in college to get an education for your future. You have the rest of your life to party so don't waste the money on tuition if you're not going to try. Bang for the buck The education is exactly what I would expect for what I pay. The price is very reasonable compared to other campus' around the area. All in all, you get what you work for. So if you want a great education and you work hard for it SCSU will offer it to you. But if you just want to get by and don't really care, that's what you'll get. Am enjoying being here The people on SCSU campus are great! Everybody always has a ton of energy and you can always find something to do. There are a lot of programs and different entertainment things to do every day. There's never a dull moment on campus. Am learning a lot The class sizes are just right here and you are able to get to know professors if you try.
